item.title: About
item.description: Hello, my name is Tyler Madonna. I am a Software Engineer currently working at the Rehab Neural Engineering Lab in Pittsburgh. I specialize in Android and iOS development but have worked with many programming languages, frameworks, and tools. Current technology stacks that I work with include: Android, Kotlin, Java, iOS, Swift, Objective-C, Python, C#, .NET, JavaScript, Node.js, React, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, and Docker.

item.title: Recipe REST API - Python
item.description: Recipe API project developed using test-driven development (TDD), Django Rest Framework, and Docker.

item.title: PyRTMA - Python
item.description: Real-Time Messaging Architecture (RTMA) client written in Python with no external dependencies. Published on the <!-- raw HTML omitted -->Python Package Index (PyPI)<!-- raw HTML omitted -->

item.title: Pittsburgh Bus Watch - iOS
item.description: iOS app that shows real-time transit information for the Pittsburgh Port Authority transit system. Published on the <!-- raw HTML omitted -->App Store<!-- raw HTML omitted -->.

item.title: Recipier - Android
item.description: Android app that stores online recipes in a clean, user-friendly interface. Published on the <!-- raw HTML omitted -->Google Play Store<!-- raw HTML omitted -->.

item.title: Contact
item.description: If you have any questions or would like to chat, feel free to contact me with the links below. Github Email LinkedIn
